long_description: This sun-stopping Patagonia rashguard gives a boy the protection he needs when snorkeling, surfing, boogie boarding or paddling out to sea. Quick-drying nylon/spandex fabric sports UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Extended sleeves and high neck with non-chafing collar provide good coverage. Anti-rash side gussets encourage flexibility. Patagonia boys' rashguard layers easily under a wetsuit. Flat seams prevent chafing. Closeout.
short_description: This sun-stopping Patagonia rashguard gives a boy the protection he needs when snorkeling, surfing, boogie boarding or paddling out to sea.
